translationtableentry.text: Viriato viene eletto capo dei Lusitani, la tribù più potente dell'Hispania.\nGrazie alla sua conoscenza del territorio e al controllo delle tattiche di guerriglia, riesce a mantenere in scacco Roma per ben otto anni.\nViriato, quando si trova all'apice del suo potere, controlla quasi tutta la penisola iberica...
translationtableentry.result: Viriato is elected chief of the Lusitanians, the most powerful tribe in Hispania.\nThanks to his knowledge of the territory and control of guerrilla tactics, he manages to keep Rome in check for eight years.\nViriato, at the height of his power, controls almost the entire Iberian Peninsula...

translationtableentry.text: Viriato es elegido jefe de los Lusitanos.\nDurante ocho años mantiene en jaque a Roma gracias a su conocimiento del terreno y al dominio de las tácticas guerrilleras.\nEn su momento de mayor poder, Viriato domina casi por completo la península ibérica...
translationtableentry.result: Viriato is elected chief of the Lusitanians, the most powerful tribe in Hispania.\nThanks to his knowledge of the territory and control of guerrilla tactics, he manages to keep Rome in check for eight years.\nViriato, at the height of his power, controls almost the entire Iberian Peninsula...
